title: [PS3] The Cube
description:
Have you got what it takes to beat The Cube?

If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re a fan of the TV show, you know that the aim of the game is to win seven consecutive challenges chosen by The Cube in order to walk away with the maximum prize of Ã‚Â£250,000.

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the same on your PS3, although there are a couple of extra challenges and new ways to play. You can even challenge friends and family to see if anyone has what it takes and because youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re playing for fun not real cash, you can play as many times as you like.

Features:

* Includes both The Voice and The Body featured in the hit TV show

* Extra DLC available for 10 more challenges
